name: Fantasy Movie League
description:
It’s not just another day at the box office with Fantasy Movie League.

Created in 2015 by a group of gaming industry veterans led by ESPN Senior Fantasy Sports Analyst Matthew Berry and acquired by National CineMedia in 2017, Fantasy Movie League is a digital game for movie fans.

Players pick 8 movies each week to fill their virtual theater. As the box office climbs, so does the player. They can compete against friends or a league of other fans to win movie tickets, swag and other prizes.

There are also exclusive articles published daily and an active community of film fans from around the world.

It’s easy to play, hard to master and all for free!
